heading: Today
text: Widespread snow showers, turning over to rain briefly in the afternoon in the warmer valleys. Accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, with higher totals over the Greens and in the southwest. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s. Southwest wind turning west at 5 to 10 mph, gusting up to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers becoming more scattered, sticking around longer in the north. Lows from the teens to mid 20s. West wind at 5 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Thursday
text: Some sunshine developing in the south, otherwise mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, additional light accumulations possible. Highs in the 20s, increasing to near 30 in the southern valleys. West wind at 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph along Lake Champlain.
